name: Abenezer Tilahun
bio: I'm Abenezer Tilahun, a passionate graphics designer with over 8 years of experience crafting visual narratives that captivate and inspire. My work spans across branding, print design, digital interfaces, and illustration art. I believe design is more than aesthetics—it's about solving problems and creating meaningful connections.
shortBio: Creating visual stories that captivate and inspire. Specializing in branding, print, digital design, and illustration.

timeline.title: Started Design Journey
timeline.description: Began freelancing as a graphic designer while studying

timeline.title: First Major Brand Project
timeline.description: Designed complete brand identity for a tech startup

timeline.title: International Recognition
timeline.description: Won multiple design awards and expanded globally

timeline.title: Education Initiative
timeline.description: Started teaching design through online courses

philosophy: Great design is invisible. It doesn't shout for attention—it simply works. My approach combines strategic thinking with creative execution, ensuring every pixel serves a purpose.
